workflow.title: Workflow of IFC data collection, crowd model, RISE simulation and 3D visualization
workflow.description: Simulation workflow for crowd modeling in building. It combines all the components needed for crowd simulation (CAD/BIM data collection, crowd modeling, crowd simulation and 3D visualization). This version cannot be executed as is due to local tools dependancies (the components in yellow). The lattest version is available in http://www.myexperiment.org/workflows/4247.html.
